document_data.name: Solara
document_data.mainbody: '''Solara''' was a mercenary leader in [[Chondath]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Solara looked to be a confident individual. She expected that all her men followed her orders without questions.
document_data.Possessions: Solara was known possess a set of ''[[elven chain mail]]'', a ''+1 [[shield]]'', a ''+2 [[spear]]'', and [[magical item|magical]] [[arrow]]s.
document_data.History:
Solara led the [[Company of the Singing Dawn]]. In [[1358 DR]], she heard rumors of a legion following the tactics of the old [[Chessentan Empire]] in [[Chondath]] and Solara decided to investigate, together with the [[Llandrydd's Steel]] group and [[Enhanen]]'s men.

She faced the [[undead]] army led by the mad cleric of [[Tempus]] [[Theodoric]].
